g.text: Selects one of two inputs based on select line. Basic building block for larger MUX.
Selects one of four inputs using 2 select lines. Can be built from three 2:1 MUX.
Selects one of eight inputs using 3 select lines. Key component in data switching.
where mᵢ is the i-th minterm
• Only one output active at a time
• Only one input selected at a time
